DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study find effectiveness ingenol mebutate compare cryotherapy ( freeze tissue ) treatment face scalp skin lesion .
DOC.brief_title: Ingenol Mebutate Compared Cryotherapy Treatment Skin Lesions
DOC.criteria: Male female subject 18 89 year old . Have least total 10 nonhypertrophic actinic keratoses ( AKs ) face scalp The subject good health The subject willingness ability understand provide inform consent use tissue able communicate investigator Subjects 18 year age age 89 Subjects pregnant lactating Subjects sensitivity cold Subjects use topical medication corticosteroid , alphahydroxyacids retinoids 2 week study entry Subjects receive previous treatment target AKs Subjects whose target treatment area within 5 cm incompletely heal wound within 10 cm suspect basalcell squamouscell carcinoma Subjects use medication treatment could interfere evaluation treatment area within 2 month study entry ( e.g. , topical medication , artificial tanner , immunosuppressive medication , immunomodulating agent , cytotoxic drug , ultraviolet B phototherapy , therapies actinic keratoses , oral retinoids ) Subjects unable understand protocol give inform consent
